name: Spartan VR
description: Built exclusively for VR. The game puts you in the midst of ancient Greek myths! Become a true Greek hero and fight in real time with swords, shields and spears against legendary Hades's creatures!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 or better Processor: Intel Core i7 4790k Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970  or better DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 7 GB available space
